summary: A comedy about making it on Wall Street. Prejudices are hard to break and Laurel Ayres quickly learns that in order for people to take her seriously she has to work for an older white man or be one.

keywords: lesbian subtext|black woman disguised as white man|pretending to be someone else|deceptive love interest|women's rights
